// Parameters:
//
//   sampler2D AttenTex;
//   sampler2D DepthSpecBuffer;
//   float4 InvShadowMapSize;
//   float2 InvTexSizeMask;
//   float4 LightAngle;
//   float4 LightColor;
//   float3 LightDir;
//   float3 LightPos;
//   float4x4 LightProjectionTex[4];
//   float4 LightRadius;
//   sampler2D NormalBuffer;
//   sampler2D ProjTex;
//   float4 RefPlaneW;
//   float4 RefPlaneX;
//   float4 RefPlaneY;
//   sampler2D ShadowTex;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name               Reg   Size
//   ------------------ ----- ----
//   LightPos           c32      1
//   LightColor         c33      1
//   LightRadius        c34      1
//   LightDir           c35      1
//   LightAngle         c36      1
//   RefPlaneX          c37      1
//   RefPlaneY          c38      1
//   RefPlaneW          c39      1
//   InvTexSizeMask     c53      1
//   InvShadowMapSize   c56      1
//   LightProjectionTex c61      4
//   NormalBuffer       s1       1
//   DepthSpecBuffer    s2       1
//   AttenTex           s3       1
//   ProjTex            s4       1
//   ShadowTex          s5       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, 2, -1, 0
    def c1, 255, 0, 0.0625, 0
    def c2, 2, -2, 1, 0
    defi i0, 5, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xyw
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.xyz
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    rcp r0.x, v1.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, v1
    mad r0.xy, r0, c0.x, c0.x
    mov r1.x, c0.x
    mad r0.xy, c53, r1.x, r0
    texld r1, r0, s2
    texld r0, r0, s1
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c0.y, c0.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c1.x
    max r1.y, r0.w, -c0.z
    rcp r0.w, v0.w
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, v0
    dp3 r1.z, r2, r0
    add r1.z, r1.z, r1.z
    mad r2.xyz, r0, -r1.z, r2
    mul r3.xyz, r0.w, v0
    mad r3.xyz, r1.x, r3, v2
    add r1.xzw, -r3.xyyz, c32.xyyz
    dp3 r0.w, r1.xzww, r1.xzww
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    mul r1.xzw, r0.w, r1
    dp3_sat r2.x, r1.xzww, r2
    pow r4.x, r2.x, r1.y
    mov r3.w, -c0.z
    dp4 r1.y, c39, r3
    mul r2, r3.y, c62
    mad r2, c61, r3.x, r2
    mad r2, c63, r3.z, r2
    add r2, r2, c64
    rcp r2.w, r2.w
    mul r2.xyz, r2.w, r2
    mul r4.yz, r2.xxyw, c56.xzww
    frc r4.yz, r4
    mad r5.zw, r2.z, c0_abs, c0_abs.xywz
    add r2.zw, -r4.xyyz, -c0.z
    mov r4.w, c0.w
    mov r6.y, -c0.y
    rep i0
      add r7.xyz, r6.y, c2
      cmp r6.z, r7.y, r4.z, -c0.z
      cmp r6.z, -r7.x, r2.w, r6.z
      mov r8.x, r4.w
      mov r8.y, -c0.y
      rep i0
        mov r6.x, r8.y
        mad r5.xy, r6, c56, r2
        texldp r9, r5, s5
        add r8.yzw, r8.y, c2.xzxy
        cmp r5.x, r8.w, r4.y, -c0.z
        cmp r5.x, -r8.z, r2.z, r5.x
        mul r5.x, r5.x, r9.x
        mad r8.x, r5.x, r6.z, r8.x
      endrep
      mov r4.w, r8.x
      mov r6.y, r7.z
    endrep
    mul r2.x, r4.w, c1.z
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul_pp r5.x, r0.w, c34.y
    mov r5.y, c0.w
    texld_pp r5, r5, s3
    dp3 r0.w, c35, -r1.xzww
    add r0.w, r0.w, -c36.x
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, c36.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r5.x
    rcp r2.y, r1.y
    dp4 r5.x, c37, r3
    dp4 r5.y, c38, r3
    mad r2.yz, r5.xxyw, r2.y, c0.x
    dp3_sat r0.x, r1.xzww, r0
    texld r3, r2.yzzw, s4
    mul r3, r3, c33
    mul r0.y, r4.x, r3.w
    mul r4.w, r0.y, r0.w
    mul r0.yzw, r0.w, r3.xxyz
    mul r4.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww
    mul oC0, r2.x, r4
    mov r0, r1.y
    texkill r0

// approximately 89 instruction slots used (5 texture, 84 arithmetic)
